attributes.action: Reject the proposed appointment of Simon Stevens as Chief Executive of the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
This man’s company, UnitedHealth Group, as part of the US private health care industry fought to stop even a limited step towards a universal health system there.  It is planned to pay him £189,000pa, well in excess of the salary the PM thinks right for public officials.

The new Chief Executive should be selected from those who have spent their lives in the NHS.
